answers.answer: There is no reason to be scared or nervous. All they are going to do is a pap smear and blood test. Plus they'll tell you the dos and donts of pregnancy and your due date! They may also schedule you for an ultrasound.

They'll also weigh you, take blood pressure, etc. Pretty normal stuff that you would usually get done on a normal well visit to your regular doctor.They'll do the weight and blood pressure and test your urine (for protein and bacteria) every visit. The pap you'll get once and the first blood tests are to test for STDs. You'll get another blood test later when you do your glucose test (make sure you don't have gestational diabetes).

question: I'm scared cause I don't know what to expect... Someone please inform me
title: first visit for pregnancy
